name: Geospatial Distribution Map
body:
### Project Introduction
I was in awe with the Facebook Global Social Network Map created by Paul Butler:

![abcd](http://revolution-computing.typepad.com/.a/6a010534b1db25970b0147e0ae51b2970b-800wi)

So i thought of trying my hand in R and hence started this small experiment of mine with this image in my mind.

***
## Information Collection
Facebook provides an awesome Graph API , that allows to get information regrding your friend's DOB,location,hometown,relationship status and many more.
Check out the graph API here: [Facebook Developers Tool](https://developers.facebook.com/tools-and-support/)
I particularly used python to query the Graph API to get hold of location detail of my facebook friends.

Start with importing all this necessary libraries
```
import sys
import urllib
import urllib2
import time
import datetime
import json
import webbrowser
import csv
```

Facebook support OAuth authentication.To get access to the facebook Graph API ,authentication is required.

webbrowser.open("https://www.facebook.com/dialog/oauth?"
                    "response_type=token&client_id=145634995501895&"
                    "redirect_uri=http://developers.facebook.com/tools/"
                    "explorer/callback&scope=user_birthday,user_friends,publish_actions"
                    ",read_stream")
